aboutInfo.text: I believe there is always something to learn, and with software technologies rapid pace, there's always something new! I enjoy collaborating with others and to work in a challenging environment demanding all my skills and efforts to explore and adapt myself in different fields and realize my potential where I get the opportunity for continuous learning.
aboutInfo.title: Frontend Developer & UI/UX Designer
aboutInfo.bottom_text: Courteous, enthusiastic, and interested in IT and everything in its orbit.

contactInfo.tag_text: Hello, Drop me a line. Well, perhaps we could meet!
